Package src.ai.environment.game.map

Class Network

java.lang.Object
src.ai.environment.game.map.Network
public class Network extends Object
A basic class to represent a network of cities and paths.
Author:
devinlinux

  • Constructor Details

    • Network

      public Network(int numNodes)
      Constructor to make a new Network.
      Parameters:
      numNodes - the number of nodes in the network

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect(int u, int v, boolean land)
      Method to add a path to the network
      Parameters:
      u - the id of the starting city of the path
      v - the id of the ending city of the path
      land - whether the path is land or sea

    • connect

      public void connect(City u, City v, boolean land)
      Method to add a path to the network using the City class.
      Parameters:
      u - the starting city of the path
      v - the ending city of the path
      land - whether the path is land or sea

    • computeDistanceBetween

      public int computeDistanceBetween(int start1, int start2, boolean land1, int end1, int end2, boolean land2)
      Method to find the number of paths between a start and an edge node. Uses a breadth first search pathfinding algorithm to calculate the fastest route between the two nodes.
      Parameters:
      start1 - the first node associated with the first path
      start2 - the second node associated with the first path
      land1 - whether the first path is a land path
      end1 - the second node associated with the second path
      end2 - the second node associated with the second path
      land2 - whether the second path is a land path

    • computeDistanceBetween

      public int computeDistanceBetween(Path start, Path end)
      Method to compute the distance between a start path and an end path using the Path class. Uses the implementation of the other computeDistanceBetween method.
      Parameters:
      start - the start Path
      end - the end Path
      Returns:
      the distance between the two paths

    • setCities

      public void setCities(List<City> cities)
      Setter to set the cities in the network.
      Parameters:
      cities - the list of cities in the network.

    • setPaths

      public void setPaths(List<Path> paths)
      Setter to set the paths in the network.
      Parameters:
      paths - the list of paths in the network.

    • getCities

      public List<City> getCities()
      Getter to return the cities in the network.
      Returns:
      the list of cities in the network

    • getPaths

      public List<Path> getPaths()
      Getter to return the paths in the network.
      Returns:
      the list of paths in the network
